titles.title: River Raisin Battlefield Acquisition Act

To direct the Secretary of the Interior to accept the donation of certain sites in Monroe County, Michigan, relating to the Battles of the River Raisin during the War of 1812 for inclusion in the National Park System.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 4/6/2006--Introduced. River Raisin Battlefield Acquisition Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) accept on behalf of the United States the donation by Monroe County, Michigan, or other willing landowners of real property in the County relating to the Battles of the River Raisin on January 18 and 22, 1813, and their aftermath; and (2) include such property in the National Park System.
